snippet: PGA Tour Commissioner Tim Finchem received a four-year contract extension, keeping him in charge of golf’s biggest tour through 2016.
abstract: PGA Tour commissioner Tim Finchem receives a four-year contract extension, keeping him in charge of golf’s biggest tour through 2016.
lead_paragraph: PGA Tour Commissioner Tim Finchem received a four-year contract extension, keeping him in charge of golf’s biggest tour through 2016.
